document.full_text: the red river was spreading out in a record swath across broad stretches of rural north dakota and minnesota on tuesday and swelling toward a near-record crest in grand forks expected within three days.
document.title: north dakota set for red river crest; rural areas awash
lines_and_colors: the red river was spreading out in a record swath across broad stretches of rural north dakota and minnesota on tuesday and swelling toward a near-record crest in grand forks expected within three days.
